about.title: Profile
about.body: Senior Software Engineer with experience across telecommunications, banking, insurance, transport, asset management, and pharmaceutical supply. Strong background in software architecture, application development, infrastructure optimization, DevOps/DevSecOps, and enterprise integration. With extensive experience in software engineering, he has contributed to impactful projects in software design, infrastructure optimization, and engineering, focusing on delivering efficient solutions that enhance performance and support organizational objectives.

seo.description: Mouadh Jaber — Software Engineer. .NET / C# / Microservices / DevOps. CV in English, French, and Arabic.
seo.keywords: Mouadh Jaber, Software Engineer, .NET, C#, Microservices, DevOps, DevSecOps, Azure, WCF, Web API
